name: Mommy Hates Playday
description:
One mom armed with a vacuum cleaner must defend her house against a horde of kids who are determined to fill it up with toys.

Tools used: 

Unity, Blender,  Audacity,  GIMP, and Mixamo

This game was made for Ludum Dare 42. 

Rate it here: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/42/mommy-hates-playday
